‘Devastating’: Auckland mum, Adrienne Smithson, dies weeks before life-extending cancer drug she campaigned for is funded in NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bowel-cancer-life-extending-drug-now-funded-for-up-to-400-患者-after-campaign-from-terminal- Patients/33TFEAAIIBHJRKTU3UQJZRHIGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bowel-cancer-life-extending-drug-now-funded-for-up-to-400-患者-after-campaign-from-terminal- Patients/33TFEAAIIBHJRKTU3UQJZRHIGI/ Isaac DavisonAdrienne Smithson spent her last months fighting for wider access to the medication. Thu, 31 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Bowel cancer patient Adrienne Smithson died on October 10 at the age of 45.
